body:
First of all I didn't know where to put this so I am just putting it here.

Ok so I am pretty sure that everyone that uses Teamspeak on the server loves the Music Room. It provides good songs and is a great place to listen to music. Although recently I have noticed that the Music Room hasn't got any well music playing. Just wandering why, if it is a glitch or just me.

Thanks TinyBear
body_tagged:

title: Music Bot TS

replies.body:
Wait, are you complaining about the songs that are being played?
If so, that is a matter of opinion and definitely not a glitch.
replies.body_tagged:
Wait, are you complaining about the songs that are being played?
If so, that is a matter of opinion and definitely not a glitch.

replies.body: I made a post about this....
replies.body_tagged: I made a post about this....

replies.body: Ahh I know what you mean. Sometimes the MusicBot is offline or has a glitch of some sort. Just check back in at a later time and it might be fixed by then. I always hate it when that happens :p
replies.body_tagged: Ahh I know what you mean. Sometimes the MusicBot is offline or has a glitch of some sort. Just check back in at a later time and it might be fixed by then. I always hate it when that happens :p

replies.body:
Are you talking about the normal music room or the musicbot room? Because the music room doesn't play music automatically, people have to go in there and play it.
As for the musicbot room, atdit has to bring the bot back up

replies.body:
The MusicBot is laggy and I don't feel like anyone wants to hear laggy music. (It's very annoying) I took him offline until I find the solution.


EDIT: Okay I bring him back up but it's your choice if you're taking the risk of a laggy music.. :/

replies.body: Doesn't seem too laggy. Thanks for bring him back up!
